channel.title: Zune HD
channel.description:
As you may or may not know, Zune has finally announced its i-pod touch competitor; Zune HD. What do you guys think? [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oNgAVbDWkZk']'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oNgAVbDWkZk'[/url]
It looks okay and a lot of the things I don't like look like they will be fixed in the final product. My one problem with it is the screen is smaller than i-touch's. I'd also want to hear what the speakers sound like.

item.title: Zune HD
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
In-ear earbuds are nice though, took me time to get used to them, but now I like them.

yeah. When my bose headphones screwed up (damn plastic, will show photos l8er), I cried I went for my old-ass apple stock earbuds. Took me nearly a month to stop whining about the lack of proper bass.

P.S. Where the hell are the tagz for crossed out text?

Read full topic

item.description:
I’ve played Dark Side of the Moon dozens of times on my iPod, and it still blows my mind every time

item.title: Zune HD
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
thelatinprodigy:

I value quality over convenience. And if you have your music all the time you sort of take it for granted and lose appreciation for it.

As someone who’s never had a portable music player, how would you know?

I’ve played Dark Side of the Moon dozens of times on my iPod, and it still blows my mind every time.

Read full topic

item.title: Zune HD
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
I value quality over convenience. And if you have your music all the time you sort of take it for granted and lose appreciation for it.

Depends on you personal views. Me myself, I listen to the music constantly. I cannot take vynils with myself, so I rip and burn it onto my portable.

Your parents are just like mine!

Yah. In Soviet Russia, parents are… hey wait a minute…

Read full topic

item.title: Zune HD
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
Dr. Perky:

nice to see Microsoft finally made a touch screen, but I think I’ll stick with my 120 gig zune i’ve never seen the point in upgrading mp3 players.

Agreed, sticking with mine until it breaks. Even if the hard drive isn’t big enough.

Read full topic

I value quality over convenience. And if you have your music all the time you sort of take it for granted and lose appreciation for it.

item.title: Zune HD
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
I remember playing the first one when I was about 11, when mom came and said i must trade it for something else, because she didn’t like the “depressing” soundtrack.
I tried to fight back, but the disk ended up in a trash can.
And there you go, I’ve lost my copy of freespace… forever. I wished I had headphones back then.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Zune HD
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Only thing that really grabs me is the 720P output, would be good for taking TV eps and movies around, no need to lug portable HDDs and burn discs.

Well I would love to have Top Gear 13 on it. but I won’t be surprised if Jobs will go on WDC like : “ololol guises i herd zune hd haz 720p outputz so we decided to stick it 2 our nu ipodz”
Btw Jambo, is that Freespace on your siggy?

Read full topic

item.title: Zune HD
item.dc:creator: jambo
item.description:
Only thing that really grabs me is the 720P output, would be good for taking TV eps and movies around, no need to lug portable HDDs and burn discs.

Radio is good also.

But tbh, with my iPhone it’s gonna take something special for me to buy another portable media device.

Read full topic

item.title: Zune HD

Awesome. Yeah, I’m a vinyl geek myself, I haven’t bought into any of portable music players.

Well if you want mobility, you would eventually end up buying one of those.
